attributes.action: Tell the British people how many MPs & or Lords & Ladies haves kids on the Front Line
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I just want to know how many people in power i.e MPs & Lords or Ladies are willing to send their own kids. I do not mean sitting at a desk or just giving orders, I mean the Front Line.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
